sourcesContent: import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, Title, Subtitle, ImgWrap, Img, } from './infoElements' import Splitting from 'splitting' const HeroSection = ({ id, blueBg, imgStart, darkText, titulo, descrip, img }) => { const split = Splitting(); useEffect(() =>{ split(); }); return ( <> {titulo} {descrip} ) } export default HeroSection
